"""
    Check that valid modified growth inputs are allowed, and invalid ones are
    rejected.
    """
zarr = np.linspace(0.0, 1.0, 15)
dfarr = 0.1 * np.ones(15)
def f_func(z):
    return 0.1 * z
for omega_g in [None, 0.0, 0.1]:
    assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
        A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=zarr, df_mg=dfarr, Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_no_warnings(ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7,
        A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=[0.0, 0.1, 0.2], df_mg=[0.1, 0.1, 0.1],
        Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=zarr, Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, df_mg=dfarr, Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=None, df_mg=dfarr, Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=zarr, df_mg=0.1, Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=zarr, df_mg=f_func, Omega_g=omega_g)
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=zarr, df_mg=dfarr[1:], Omega_g=omega_g
        )
    assert_raises(ValueError, ccl.Cosmology, Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=
        0.7, A_s=2.1e-09, n_s=0.96, z_mg=zarr, df_mg=np.column_stack((dfarr,
        dfarr)), Omega_g=omega_g)
